name: Dungeon Diner (DanielDestefanis)
description:
Dungeon Diner is a top-down dungeon crawler. Slay monsters and harvest their parts to cook tasty dishes for hungry customers!

You control Martin, a veteran monster hunter who runs a restaurant on top of a monster dungeon. Balance your time by taking orders from hungry customers and going down into the dungeon. There you will face off against an assortment of monsters. As you serve customers, use the gold you earn to upgrade either the diner, the dungeon or Martin himself!

Developers: 

Daniel Destefanis - Project Coordinator, UI/UX Designer, Level Designer, Gameplay Designer
